## ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏° ‡∏Ñ‡∏û.05

### ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤

- ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏™‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°
- ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô

### ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó/‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
- ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó/‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
- ‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
- **‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô** (internshipPosition) - ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
- **‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á (‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠/HR)** (contactPersonName) - ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏∏‡∏Ñ‡∏Ñ‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ HR ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó
- **‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠** (contactPersonPosition) - ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ HR

### ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô (‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà! - ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡πà‡∏á CS05)
- **‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô** (supervisorName) - ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏û‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó
- **‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô** (supervisorPosition) - ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏û‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏¢‡∏á üÜï
- **‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô** (supervisorPhone) - ‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏û‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏¢‡∏á
- **‡∏≠‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô** (supervisorEmail) - ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏•‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏û‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏¢‡∏á

### ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
- ‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
- ‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
- ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô (‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥)

### ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏¢‡πå‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà

### 1. ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô (supervisorPosition) üÜï

```jsx
    placeholder="‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô"
```

## ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ (CompanyInfoForm) üÜï

### ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å
- **‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞ CS05 ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥**: ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏µ CS05 ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
- **‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç**: ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏µ CS05 ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà pending ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ approved
- **‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•/‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç**: ‡∏™‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏î‡∏π‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç
- **‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ä‡∏±‡πà‡∏ß‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ß**: ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÉ‡∏ô localStorage ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç

### ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
```jsx
// ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ô‡∏≥‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô route
```

### ‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
1. **Loading**: ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á Skeleton ‡∏Ç‡∏ì‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö CS05
2. **No CS05**: ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤ Result ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á CS05 ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô
3. **CS05 Rejected**: ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤ Result ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏¢‡πå

### ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÜ

```jsx
          <Button onClick={() => navigate('/internship')}>
            ‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å
```

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•

‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÜ ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö:
1. **‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• (ReviewDataStep)** - ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á
2. **‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á (SubmissionResultStep)** - ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢
3. **‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏î CS05** - ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏π‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß
4. **‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ (CompanyInfoForm)** üÜï - ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

## ‡∏•‡∏≥‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• (‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï)

### ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 1: ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á CS05
1. **‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó/‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô**
   - ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó/‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
   - ‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
   - **‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô** (internshipPosition)
   - **‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á (‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠/HR)** (contactPersonName)
   - **‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠** (contactPersonPosition)

2. **‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤**
   - ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô 1 ‡∏Ñ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ 2 ‡∏Ñ‡∏ô
   - ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤ (‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠-‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏Å‡∏∏‡∏•, ‡∏ä‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏µ, ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á, ‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤, ‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå, ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏™‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°)

3. **‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô**
   - ‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô (‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 60 ‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô)

4. **‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î Transcript**
   - ‡πÉ‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô (‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå PDF, ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏™‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 81 ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ï)

### ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 2: ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ (‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡πà‡∏á CS05) üÜï
1. **‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞ CS05**
   - ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏µ CS05 ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà pending ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ approved ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà

2. **‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô**
   - ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô (‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ö)
   - ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô (‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ö) üÜï
   - ‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå (‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ö)
   - ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏• (‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ö)

## API Endpoints ‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà üÜï

### 1. ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
```
POST /api/internship/company-info/submit
```

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "documentId": 44,
  "supervisorName": "‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô",
  "supervisorPosition": "‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô",
  "supervisorPhone": "0999999999",
  "supervisorEmail": "supervisor@company.com"
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß",
  "data": {
    "documentId": 44,
    "companyName": "‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó ABC ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏î",
    "supervisorName": "‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô",
    "supervisorPosition": "‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô",
    "supervisorPhone": "0999999999",
    "supervisorEmail": "supervisor@company.com"
  }
}
```

### 2. ‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

```json
    "supervisorName": "‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô",
    "supervisorPosition": "‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô",
```

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î (Error Handling) üÜï

### 1. ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô TypeError
```javascript
// ‚úÖ ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á - ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ trim()
const safeStringTrim = (value, fieldName) => {
  if (value === null || value === undefined) {
    console.warn(`Field ${fieldName} is null or undefined`);
    return '';
  }
  if (typeof value !== 'string') {
    console.warn(`Field ${fieldName} is not a string:`, typeof value, value);
    return String(value).trim();
  }
  return value.trim();
};

// ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
const supervisorName = safeStringTrim(values.supervisorName, 'supervisorName');
```

### 2. ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞ CS05
```javascript
// ‚úÖ ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á
setCanEditCompanyInfo(
  cs05Data.status === 'pending' || cs05Data.status === 'approved'
);

// ‚ùå ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î (‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô true ‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏≠)
setCanEditCompanyInfo(cs05Data.status === 'pending'|| 'approved');
```

### 3. ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô
```javascript
// ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢
<Form.Item
  name="supervisorPosition"
  label="‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô"
  rules={[{ required: false }]}
  initialValue="" // üÜï ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô
>
  <Input placeholder="‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô" disabled={isDisabled} />
</Form.Item>
```

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏á üÜï

### ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö CompanyInfoForm
```javascript
const onFinish = async (values) => {
  setLoading(true);
  try {
    // ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô
    if (!documentId) {
      throw new Error('‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏û‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏£ CS05');
    }

    if (!canEditCompanyInfo) {
      throw new Error('‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á CS05');
    }

    // ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢
    const supervisorName = values.supervisorName ? values.supervisorName.trim() : '';
    const supervisorPosition = values.supervisorPosition ? values.supervisorPosition.trim() : '';
    const supervisorPhone = values.supervisorPhone ? values.supervisorPhone.trim() : '';
    const supervisorEmail = values.supervisorEmail ? values.supervisorEmail.trim() : '';

    // ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•
    const response = await internshipService.submitCompanyInfo({
      documentId,
      supervisorName,
      supervisorPosition, // üÜï ‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
      supervisorPhone,
      supervisorEmail
    });

    if (response.success) {
      message.success('‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏à');
      // ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï context ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ UI
    }
  } catch (error) {
    message.error(error.message);
  } finally {
    setLoading(false);
  }
};
```

## Backend API Implementation üÜï

### Controller
```javascript
// filepath: cslogbook/backend/controllers/documents/internshipController.js
exports.submitCompanyInfo = async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const { documentId, supervisorName, supervisorPosition, supervisorPhone, supervisorEmail } = req.body;
    const userId = req.user.userId;

    // ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•
    if (!documentId || !supervisorName || !supervisorPhone || !supervisorEmail) {
      return res.status(400).json({
        success: false,
        message: '‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏ô'
      });
    }

    // ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å Service
    const result = await internshipManagementService.submitCompanyInfo(
      documentId,
      userId,
      { supervisorName, supervisorPosition, supervisorPhone, supervisorEmail }
    );
    
    return res.json({
      success: true,
      message: '‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß',
      data: result
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Submit Company Info Error:', error);
    return res.status(500).json({
      success: false,
      message: error.message || '‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î'
    });
  }
};
```

### Service
```javascript
// filepath: cslogbook/backend/services/internshipManagementService.js
async submitCompanyInfo(documentId, userId, { supervisorName, supervisorPhone, supervisorEmail, supervisorPosition }) {
  const transaction = await sequelize.transaction();
  try {
    // ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏£ CS05
    const document = await Document.findOne({
      where: { documentId, userId },
      include: [{ model: InternshipDocument, as: "internshipDocument" }],
      transaction,
    });

    if (!document) {
      throw new Error("‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏û‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏£ CS05");
    }

    // ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞
    if (document.status === 'rejected') {
      throw new Error('‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ô‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á CS05 ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥');
    }

    // ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•
    await document.internshipDocument.update({
      supervisorName: supervisorName.trim(),
      supervisorPosition: supervisorPosition ? supervisorPosition.trim() : '', // üÜï ‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
      supervisorPhone: supervisorPhone.trim(),
      supervisorEmail: supervisorEmail.trim(),
    }, { transaction });

    await transaction.commit();
    return { /* ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï */ };
  } catch (error) {
    await transaction.rollback();
    throw error;
  }
}
```

## ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ç (‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï)

### ‚ö†Ô∏è ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏£‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏á
1. **‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå supervisorPosition ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô optional field** - ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å
2. **‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏°‡∏µ CS05 ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ**
3. **‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞ CS05 ‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô pending ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ approved** - ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤ rejected ‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ
4. **‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô** - ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ string ‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á ('') ‡πÅ‡∏ó‡∏ô undefined/null

### üîß ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ Debug
```javascript
// ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ log ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢ debug
console.log('=== DEBUG: Form Values ===');
console.log('supervisorPosition:', values.supervisorPosition, 'Type:', typeof values.supervisorPosition);
console.log('========================');
```

### üì± Responsive Design
CompanyInfoForm ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏ö‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≠‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÜ:
```css
.internship-container {
  padding: 16px;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .internship-container {
    padding: 8px;
  }
}
```

## Best Practices (‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï)

### 1. ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ State ‡πÉ‡∏ô CompanyInfoForm
```javascript
// ‚úÖ ‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏ô‡∏≥
const [cs05Data, setLocalCS05Data] = useState(state?.registration?.cs05?.data || null);
const [canEditCompanyInfo, setCanEditCompanyInfo] = useState(false);

// ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å API ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö CS05 ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏á
useEffect(() => {
  const checkCS05Status = async () => {
    const response = await internshipService.getCurrentCS05();
    if (response.success && response.data) {
      setLocalCS05Data(response.data);
      setCanEditCompanyInfo(
        response.data.status === 'pending' || response.data.status === 'approved'
      );
    }
  };
  checkCS05Status();
}, []);
```

### 2. ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î
```javascript
// ‚úÖ ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏•‡∏∏‡∏°
try {
  const response = await internshipService.submitCompanyInfo(data);
  // Success handling
} catch (error) {
  if (error.response?.status === 404) {
    message.error('‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏û‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏£ CS05');
  } else if (error.response?.status === 403) {
    message.error('‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏™‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏ò‡∏¥‡πå‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•');
  } else {
    message.error(error.message || '‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î');
  }
}
```

### 3. ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏™‡πà‡∏á
```javascript
// ‚úÖ ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏ô
const validateCompanyData = (data) => {
  if (!data.supervisorName || !data.supervisorPhone || !data.supervisorEmail) {
    return false;
  }
  
  // ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏•
  const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  if (!emailRegex.test(data.supervisorEmail)) {
    return false;
  }
  
  return true;
};
```

### 4. ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏°‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà

‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏° ‡∏Ñ‡∏û.05 ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á 3 ‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏î‡∏±‡∏á‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ:

```javascript
// ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•
const handleSubmit = async (finalData) => {
  try {
    setLoading(true);
    
    // ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ finalData.transcriptFile ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå PDF ‡∏à‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á‡πÜ ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
    let pdfFileToUpload = null;
    let isPDF = false;
    
    if (finalData.transcriptFile instanceof File) {
      pdfFileToUpload = finalData.transcriptFile;
      isPDF = pdfFileToUpload.type === 'application/pdf';
    } else if (finalData.transcriptFile?.originFileObj) {
      pdfFileToUpload = finalData.transcriptFile.originFileObj;
      isPDF = pdfFileToUpload.type === 'application/pdf';
    }
    
    if (!pdfFileToUpload || !isPDF) {
      message.error('‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏≤‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå PDF ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô');
      setLoading(false);
      return;
    }
    
    // ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á FormData ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå
    const formData = new FormData();
    
    // ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• JSON ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á API
    const submitData = {
      documentType: 'internship',
      documentName: 'CS05',
      category: 'proposal',
      studentId: studentData.studentId,
      fullName: studentData.fullName,
      year: studentData.year,
      totalCredits: studentData.totalCredits,
      companyName: finalData.companyName,
      companyAddress: finalData.companyAddress,
      startDate: finalData.startDate,
      endDate: finalData.endDate,
      // ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
      internshipPosition: finalData.internshipPosition || '',
      contactPersonName: finalData.contactPersonName || '',
      contactPersonPosition: finalData.contactPersonPosition || '',
      // ...existing code...
    };
    
    // ‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• JSON
    formData.append('formData', JSON.stringify(submitData));
    
    // ‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå transcript
    formData.append('transcript', pdfFileToUpload);

    // ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á backend
    const response = await internshipService.submitCS05WithTranscript(formData);

    if (response.success) {
      message.success('‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á ‡∏Ñ‡∏û.05 ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß');
      setExistingCS05(response.data);
      setIsSubmitted(true);
      setFormSubmitted(true); // ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏±‡∏î‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ
      setCurrentStep(2); // ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤ SubmissionResultStep
      
      // ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô localStorage ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏π‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á
      localStorage.setItem('cs05_submitted', 'true');
      localStorage.setItem('cs05_data', JSON.stringify(response.data));
      localStorage.setItem('cs05_submission_date', new Date().toISOString());
    } else {
      throw new Error(response.message || '‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ');
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Submit error:', error);
    message.error(error.message || '‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á');
  } finally {
    setLoading(false);
  }
};
```

## ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏á‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤ SubmissionResultStep

‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå:

```javascript
// ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå
{(displayData.studentData?.[0]?.classroom || displayData.classroom || displayData.studentData?.[0]?.phoneNumber || displayData.phoneNumber) && (
  <>
    <Divider style={{ margin: "12px 0" }} />
    <Row gutter={16}>
      <Col xs={24} md={12}>
        <div>
          <Text strong>‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á: </Text>
          <Text>{displayData.studentData?.[0]?.classroom || displayData.classroom || '-'}</Text>
        </div>
      </Col>
      <Col xs={24} md={12}>
        <div>
          <Text strong>‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå: </Text>
          <Text>{displayData.studentData?.[0]?.phoneNumber || displayData.phoneNumber || '-'}</Text>
        </div>
      </Col>
    </Row>
  </>
)}
```

## ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å localStorage

‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏π‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á:

```javascript
// ‡πÉ‡∏ô InternshipRegistrationFlow.js
useEffect(() => {
  // ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏¢‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
  const isSubmitted = localStorage.getItem('cs05_submitted') === 'true';
  const savedCS05Data = localStorage.getItem('cs05_data');
  
  if (isSubmitted && savedCS05Data) {
    try {
      const parsedData = JSON.parse(savedCS05Data);
      setExistingCS05(parsedData);
      setIsSubmitted(true);
      setFormSubmitted(true);
      
      // ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏∏‡πÉ‡∏ô URL ‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏î‡∏π‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á
      const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      if (urlParams.get('view') === 'result') {
        setCurrentStep(2); // ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤ SubmissionResultStep
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error parsing saved CS05 data:', error);
    }
  }
}, []);
```

## ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô:

```javascript
const calculateInternshipDuration = (startDate, endDate) => {
  if (!startDate || !endDate) return '';
  
  const start = dayjs(startDate);
  const end = dayjs(endDate);
  const diffInDays = end.diff(start, 'day') + 1;
  const diffInMonths = Math.round(diffInDays / 30);
  
  return `${diffInMonths} ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô (${diffInDays} ‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô)`;
};
```

## ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• Student ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï

‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå:

```javascript
// ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• Student
{
  fullName: '‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠ ‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏Å‡∏∏‡∏•', // ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠-‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏Å‡∏∏‡∏•‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤
  studentId: '64xxxxxxxx', // ‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤
  yearLevel: 3,            // ‡∏ä‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏µ
  classroom: 'RC',         // ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á (RA, RB, RC, DA, DB, CSB)
  phoneNumber: '09xxxxxxxx', // ‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå
  totalCredits: 100        // ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏™‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°
}
```

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡πÉ‡∏ô ReviewDataStep

‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå:

```javascript
<Row gutter={16}>
  <Col span={12}>
    <div><Text>‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠-‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏Å‡∏∏‡∏•:</Text> {formData.studentData?.[0]?.fullName || studentData?.fullName}</div>
    <div><Text>‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏®‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏≤:</Text> {formData.studentData?.[0]?.studentId || studentData?.studentId}</div>
    <div><Text>‡∏ä‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏µ:</Text> {formData.studentData?.[0]?.yearLevel || studentData?.year}</div>
  </Col>
  <Col span={12}>
    <div><Text>‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á:</Text> {formData.studentData?.[0]?.classroom || '-'}</div>
    <div><Text>‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå:</Text> {formData.studentData?.[0]?.phoneNumber || '-'}</div>
    <div><Text>‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏™‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°:</Text> {formData.studentData?.[0]?.totalCredits || studentData?.totalCredits} ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ï</div>
  </Col>
</Row>
```

## ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏õ‡∏±‡∏ç‡∏´‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ô Backend

‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå PDF ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ù‡∏±‡πà‡∏á Backend:

```javascript
// filepath: cslogbook/backend/controllers/documents/internshipController.js
exports.submitCS05WithTranscript = async (req, res) => {
  try {
    // ‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏•‡∏≥‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå
    const result = await internshipManagementService.submitCS05WithTranscript(
      req.user.userId,
      req.file,   // ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á fileData ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô req.file
      req.body.formData ? JSON.parse(req.body.formData) : req.body // ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á formData
    );
    
    return res.status(201).json({
      success: true,
      ...result
    });

  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error in submitCS05WithTranscript:', error);
    return res.status(500).json({
      success: false,
      message: error.message || '‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•'
    });
  }
};
```

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πå‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏∏‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå

‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πå‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏∏‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤ SubmissionResultStep (‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥):

```javascript
const handleDownloadLetter = () => {
  if (!existingCS05 || existingCS05.status !== 'approved') {
    message.info('‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏∏‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πå‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î');
    return;
  }
  
  // ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πå‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∑‡∏≠
  window.open(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/api/internship/letters/${existingCS05.letterId}`, '_blank');
};

// ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°
<Button 
  type="primary" 
  icon={<DownloadOutlined />}
  onClick={handleDownloadLetter}
  disabled={!existingCS05 || existingCS05.status !== 'approved'}
>
  ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πå‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏∏‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå
</Button>
```

## Best Practices ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• (‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï)

```javascript
// ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏ô‡∏≥‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå
const handleFormSubmit = (values) => {
  // 1. ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå transcript ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏™‡πà‡∏á
  if (!transcriptFile) {
    message.error('‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏≤‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô (Transcript)');
    return;
  }
  
  if (transcriptFile instanceof File && transcriptFile.type !== 'application/pdf') {
    message.error('‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏≤‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå PDF ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô');
    return;
  }
  
  // 2. ‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•
  const submitData = {
    ...values,
    transcriptFile: transcriptFile
  };
  
  // 3. ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á parent component
  onSubmit(submitData);
};
```

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏°‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏™‡πà‡∏á

```javascript
// ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å DatePicker ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
if (values.internshipDateRange && values.internshipDateRange.length === 2) {
  values.startDate = values.internshipDateRange[0].format('YYYY-MM-DD');
  values.endDate = values.internshipDateRange[1].format('YYYY-MM-DD');
}

// ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
values.internshipDuration = calculateInternshipDays(values.internshipDateRange);
```

## ‡∏õ‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏î‡∏π‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á

```javascript
// ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô sidebar
{isSubmitted && currentStep !== 2 && (
  <Button 
    type="primary" 
    block 
    onClick={() => setCurrentStep(2)}
    style={{ marginTop: 16 }}
  >
    ‡∏î‡∏π‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏•‡πà‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î
  </Button>
)}
```


---

## Development Guidelines (‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï)

- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÅ‡∏ô‡πà‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå
- ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á localStorage ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏°‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå PDF ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á backend
- ‡∏î‡∏π‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤
- ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏®‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ó‡πå

**‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏ï‡∏∏**: ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏ô‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ï‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ü‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏à‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏û‡∏±‡∏í‡∏ô‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
